_source.text: 4) Soundtracks - whether they be pop tunes ( Titan A.E. )or instrumental ( Gladiator ), I tend to end up liking the soundtracks better than the movies, as it is the music that really transforms and helps to create emotional content in the movie.

text: end up liking the soundtracks **better** **than** the **movies**, as it is the music that really transforms and helps to **create** emotional content in the movie.

_source.text: 1970's car chase movies are so much better than modern car chase movies because they really did the stunts you see up on the screen.

text: 1970's car **chase** **movies** are so much **better** **than** modern car **chase** **movies** because they really did the stunts you see up on the screen.

_source.text: 7. Vacation The Griswolds may have had a slew of movies, but none were better than the first that saw Chevy Chase pile his clan into the family truckster and head cross country from their Chicago area home to their mecca... Wally World!

text: 7. Vacation The Griswolds may have had a slew of **movies**, but none were **better** **than** the first that
saw Chevy **Chase** pile his clan into the family truckster and head cross country from their Chicago area home to their mecca... Wally World!
